markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanara Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4004) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 55</row>

</column>

---

You favor weapons steeped in vanaran tradition. You gain access to, and are trained with, the [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [chakram](/Weapons.aspx?ID=235), [katar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=14), [panabas](/Weapons.aspx?ID=265), and [urumi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=102). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [vanara](/Traits.aspx?ID=368) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial vanara weapons are simple weapons, and advanced vanara weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Vanara Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Vanara Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=4019), [Vanara Weapon Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=4011)
name: Vanara Weapon Familiarity
